post.body: Thank you. Hectic late nights.
Got the music review up for Believe by Raishein. Link: http://bit.ly/S9FiNow I got to get the press releases ready for it.
Finally! Got the interview w/ Raishein posted. Link: http://bit.ly/4efLGsNow I'm working on getting the music review posted.
Currently listening to Blue Sky Black Death album "Jean Grae: Evil Jeanius". Link: http://bit.ly/1Nxz
Just finished editing the interview with Rashein. Hopefully I can get it posted today along with it's music review. Gotta rush to get r ...
Way behind schedule! Gotta edit and post Rashein's interview and music review of Believe. Link: http://raishein.com/
Just emailed Adrienna Turner a quote to edit her book entitle Let the Day Begin With Christ
Just got through checking my MySpace page. Tons of happy new year's and happy birthday wishes. A couple people congratulated me on writ ...
Now that Christmas, New Year's and my birthday is out of the way, time to get back down to business.
Just got off work. 'bout to celebrate my birthday with my wife. Hope I make it to work tomorrow. (heheh)
Just finished editing the interview questions of Patricia Dorsey, author of Reflections of a Mississippi Magnolia. Link: http://bit.ly ...
Having a hard time posting new content on the site. New year's, My Birthday (ahem...which is 01-02-09...cough, cough), work, family, ya ...
Just emailed interview questions to Loretta Walls, author of A Fantasy of Love. Link: http://bit.ly/Sr9x
Happy New Year. I left Church @3:30a got up for work @ 7:00a @ work @ 8:30a left work @ 6pm family dinnder til 10p going to bed ASAP!
Just emailed the interview questions to Precious Love, author of Jailed by Blood.
Just emailed interview questions to Brian McClellan, author of A Love Letter to Black People. Link: http://bit.ly/On6Z
Man! My article on Urban Book Source has brought some, let's say "interesting", comments. Check it out. Link: http://bit.ly/tiR2
Happy New Year. Relentless Aaron just ripped me a new on my Urban Lit is DEAD! article on Urban Book Source. I got to get back at him. ...
I'm tired. Holla at you next year. Gotta go to church tonight and to sleep early, early next year...lol!
Happy new year, also.
